<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H5197>speak<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuaries,<s%> and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

and <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H413>against<s%> you; and I shall <S%H3318>draw<s%> My <S%H2719>sword<s%> out of its <S%H8593>sheath<s%> and <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from you the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>

<S%H3282>"Because<s%> I shall <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from you the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> My <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from its <S%H8593>sheath<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> from <S%H5045>south<s%> [to] <S%H6828>north.<s%>

"Thus <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> have <S%H3318>drawn<s%> My <S%H2719>sword<s%> out of its <S%H8593>sheath.<s%> It will not <S%H7725>return<s%> [to its sheath] <S%H5750>again.<s%>"'

"As for you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H584>groan<s%> with <S%H7670>breaking<s%> <S%H4975>heart<s%> and <S%H4814>bitter<s%> <S%H4814>grief,<s%> <S%H584>groan<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H559>say<s%> to you, <S%H5921>'Why<s%> <S%H4100><s%> do you <S%H584>groan<s%>?' that you will <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H413>'Because<s%> of the <S%H8052>news<s%> that is <S%H935>coming;<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> will <S%H4549>melt,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> will be <S%H7503>feeble,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> will <S%H3543>faint,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1290>knees<s%> will be <S%H1980>weak<s%> as <S%H4325>water.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> it <S%H935>comes<s%> and it will <S%H1961>happen,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>"
Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> <S%H559>'Say,<s%> 'A <S%H2719>sword,<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H2300>sharpened<s%> And <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H4803>polished!<s%>

<S%H2300>'Sharpened<s%> to <S%H2873>make<s%> a <S%H2874>slaughter,<s%> <S%H4803>Polished<s%> to <S%H1300>flash<s%> like <S%H1300>lightning!<s%>' <S%H176>Or<s%> shall we <S%H7797>rejoice,<s%> the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of My <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3988>despising<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%>?

"And it is <S%H5414>given<s%> to be <S%H4803>polished,<s%> that it may be <S%H8610>handled;<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H2300>sharpened<s%> and <S%H4803>polished,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H2026>slayer.<s%>

<S%H2199>"Cry<s%> out and <S%H3213>wail,<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man;<s%> for it is against My <S%H5971>people,<s%> it is against <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5387>officials<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> They are <S%H4048>delivered<s%> over to the <S%H2719>sword<s%> with My <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> <S%H5606>strike<s%> [your] <S%H3409>thigh.<s%>

"For [there is] a <S%H976>testing;<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> the <S%H7626>rod<s%> which <S%H3988>despises<s%> will be <S%H3808>no<s%> more?" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>

"You therefore, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and <S%H5221>clap<s%> [your] <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H413>together<s%><S%H3709>;<s%> and let the <S%H2719>sword<s%> be <S%H3717>doubled<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H7992>time,<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> for the <S%H2491>slain.<s%> It is the <S%H2719>sword<s%> for the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1419>one<s%> <S%H2491>slain,<s%> which <S%H2314>surrounds<s%> them,

that [their] <S%H3820>hearts<s%> may <S%H4127>melt,<s%> and <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H4383>fall<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H8179>gates.<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H19>glittering<s%> <S%H2719>sword.<s%> Ah! It is <S%H6213>made<s%> [for striking] like <S%H1300>lightning,<s%> it is <S%H5844>wrapped<s%> up [in readiness] for <S%H2874>slaughter.<s%>

<S%H2300>"Show<s%> yourself <S%H2300>sharp,<s%> <S%H3231>go<s%> to the <S%H3231>right;<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> yourself; <S%H8041>go<s%> to the <S%H8041>left,<s%> <S%H575>wherever<s%> your <S%H6440>edge<s%> is <S%H3259>appointed.<s%>

"I shall <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5221>clap<s%> My <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H413>together,<s%> <S%H3709><s%> and I shall <S%H5117>appease<s%> My <S%H2534>wrath;<s%> I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>"
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"As for you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%> for the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> to <S%H935>come;<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them will <S%H3318>go<s%> out of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%> And <S%H1254>make<s%> a <S%H3027>signpost;<s%> <S%H1254>make<s%> it at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%> to the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

"You shall <S%H7760>mark<s%> a <S%H1870>way<s%> for the <S%H2719>sword<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and to <S%H3063>Judah<s%> into <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

"For the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5975>stands<s%> at the <S%H517>parting<s%> of the <S%H1870>way,<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1870>ways,<s%> to <S%H7080>use<s%> <S%H7081>divination;<s%> he <S%H7043>shakes<s%> the <S%H2671>arrows,<s%> he <S%H7592>consults<s%> the <S%H8655>household<s%> <S%H8655>idols,<s%> he <S%H7200>looks<s%> at the <S%H3516>liver.<s%>

"Into his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> the <S%H7081>divination,<s%> <S%H3389>'Jerusalem,<s%>' to <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H3733>battering<s%> <S%H3733>rams,<s%> to <S%H6605>open<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> for <S%H7524>slaughter,<s%> to <S%H7311>lift<s%> up the <S%H6963>voice<s%> with a <S%H8643>battle<s%> <S%H8643>cry,<s%> to <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H3733>battering<s%> <S%H3733>rams<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> to <S%H8210>cast<s%> up <S%H5550>mounds,<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1785>siege<s%> <S%H1785>wall.<s%>

"And it will be to them like a <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H7080>divination<s%> in their <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> they have [sworn] <S%H7650>solemn<s%> <S%H7621>oaths.<s%> But he <S%H2142>brings<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to <S%H2142>remembrance,<s%> that they may be <S%H8610>seized.<s%>

<S%H3651>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H3282>'Because<s%> you have made your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to be <S%H2142>remembered,<s%> in that your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> are <S%H1540>uncovered,<s%> so that in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5949>deeds<s%> your <S%H9128>sins<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> – <S%H3282>because<s%> you have <S%H2142>come<s%> to <S%H2142>remembrance,<s%> you will be <S%H8610>seized<s%> with the <S%H3709>hand.<s%>

'And you, O <S%H2491>slain,<s%> <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>one,<s%> the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> has <S%H935>come,<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H5771>punishment<s%> of the <S%H7093>end,<s%>'

<S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H5493>'Remove<s%> the <S%H4701>turban,<s%> and <S%H7311>take<s%> <S%H7311>off<s%> the <S%H5850>crown;<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> will [be] <S%H3808>no<s%> more the <S%H2088>same.<s%> <S%H1361>Exalt<s%> that <S%H8217>which<s%> is <S%H8217>low,<s%> and <S%H8213>abase<s%> that <S%H1364>which<s%> is <S%H1364>high.<s%>

'A <S%H5754>ruin,<s%> a <S%H5754>ruin,<s%> a <S%H5754>ruin,<s%> I shall <S%H7760>make<s%> it. <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> will be <S%H3808>no<s%> more, <S%H5704>until<s%> He <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H4941>right<s%> it is; and I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> it [to Him.]'

"And you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God<s%> <S%H413>concerning<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> and <S%H413>concerning<s%> their <S%H2781>reproach,<s%>' and <S%H559>say:<s%> 'A <S%H2719>sword,<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H6605>drawn,<s%> <S%H4803>polished<s%> for the <S%H2874>slaughter,<s%> to cause it to <S%H398>consume,<s%> that it may be like <S%H1300>lightning<s%> –

while they <S%H2372>see<s%> for you <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H7723>visions,<s%> while they <S%H7080>divine<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> for you – to <S%H5414>place<s%> you on the <S%H6677>necks<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2491>who<s%> are <S%H2491>slain,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> has <S%H935>come,<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H5771>punishment<s%> of the <S%H7093>end.<s%>

<S%H7725>'Return<s%> [it] to its <S%H8593>sheath.<s%> In the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> you were <S%H1254>created,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H4351>origin,<s%> I shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> you.

'And I shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> out My <S%H2195>indignation<s%> on you; I shall <S%H6315>blow<s%> on you with the <S%H784>fire<s%> of My <S%H5678>wrath,<s%> and I shall <S%H5414>give<s%> you into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H9059>brutal<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H2796>skilled<s%> in <S%H4889>destruction.<s%>

'You will be <S%H402>fuel<s%> for the <S%H784>fire;<s%> your <S%H1818>blood<s%> will be in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%> You will not be <S%H2142>remembered,<s%> for I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>' "
